Interface IEnquiryServices

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryController
public interface IEnquiryServices
Defines enquiry‐management services for applicants, officers, and managers:
  • Submit a new enquiry
  • Retrieve an applicant’s own enquiries
  • Delete an existing enquiry
  • Retrieve enquiries for specific projects
  • Retrieve all enquiries for managers
Since:
24/4/2025
Version:
final
Author:
FCSH Group 2

    Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.

    Deletes an existing enquiry from the system.

    Retrieves all enquiries associated with the given set of projects.

  • Method Details

    • getProjectsEnquiries

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> getProjectsEnquiries(Map<String,Project> projects)
      Retrieves all enquiries associated with the given set of projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - map of project names to Project objects to search
      Returns:
      map of enquiry IDs to Enquiry objects matching those projects

    • deleteEnquiry

      void deleteEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Deletes an existing enquiry from the system.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the Enquiry object to delete

    • applicantGetEnquiries

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> applicantGetEnquiries(Applicant applicant)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the Applicant whose enquiries to retrieve
      Returns:
      map of enquiry IDs to Enquiry objects for that applicant

    • submitEnquiry

      void submitEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Submits a new enquiry into the system.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the Enquiry object to submit

    • ManagerGetAllEnquiries

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> ManagerGetAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries in the system (for manager overview).
      Returns:
      map of all enquiry IDs to Enquiry objects
